name: Commander Keen(ish) #TweetTweetJam
description:
My 3rd #TweetTweetJam entry is: Keen-ish !
An attempt to remake the classic "Commander Keen" game, by id Software (from the brain of Tom Hall) in PICO-8, but in just 560 chars, and uses NO art assets! 😅

CONTROLS:

  • Walk   = ◀ /  ▶
  • Jump = 🔼

GAME:

  • Collect red lollypops 🍭
  • Say hi to a few Yorps while you're at it 👽
  • That's about it!
    (turns out, it's tough to squeeze a full platformer, with generated map and sprites in just 560 chars!)

Have fun & thanks for playing! 😁
